get.description: Get a list of all secrets for all services
get.summary: List all secrets

post.description:
Set the secret cert from file
Example curl -X POST -F 'Secret_cert=@certificate.pem' http://localhost:1323/secret/testsecret/cert | python -m json.tool
post.summary: Set the secret cert from file

parameters.description: Location of file holding the secret cert
parameters.name: secret_cert

post.description:
Set the secret key from file
Example curl -X POST -F 'Secret_key=@private_key.pem' http://localhost:1323/secret/testsecret/key | python -m json.tool
post.summary: Set the secret key from file

parameters.description: Location of file holding the secret key
parameters.name: secret_key

route_config.description: Route_config holds configuration in json. Use this config if present. Else, fallback to individual fields above

secret_config.description: Secret_config holds configuration in json. Use this config if present. Else, fallback to individual fields above

service_config.description: Service_config holds configuration in json. Use this config if present. Else, fallback to individual fields above

upstream_config.description: Upstream_config holds configuration in json. Use this config if present. Else, fallback to individual fields above
